title: Game keeps crashing after champ select. Cant get in to a game. Please help!
body: Will not even bring me to the loading screen, keeps disconnecting me. This is the 13th time I've had this happen in the past week. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling multiple times and it does not go away. My internet connection is stable. Idk whats going on. Please help me before riot drops the ban hammer on me for these bugs!

replies.body: Did you recently update your graphics card's drivers? This happened to me before, and I had to system restore back to the point before I did and it fixed it. Some drivers are stable at first for the game.

This particular issues almost exclusively happens if your computer cannot make a good connection to the gameserver the match is on. This commonly results from an *unstable connection* to the servers, so I strongly suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure no local settings are conflicting with League.

Let me know if this caused any change.
